entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
